BaseLegendClass

public BaseLegendClass(Symbol symbol,
                       Object value)
create a classification that maps a Symbol with a value or range of values. Automatically sets the label value to be value.toString() if value is non-null

Parameters:
symbol -
value -
See Also:
BaseLegendClass(Symbol,Object,String)

BaseLegendClass

public BaseLegendClass(Symbol symbol,
                       Object value,
                       String label)
create a classification that maps a Symbol with a value or range of values

Parameters:
symbol - the Symbol
value - the associated value or value range, or null == OTHER in ValueMapRenderer
label - the label to be shown in a TOC legend, or null == use default
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if symbol is null
